snippet.title: Amber Heard 'feared for her life' during marriage to Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Hollywood star Amber Heard says she feared for her life during her marriage to actor Johnny Depp, claiming he threatened to kill her on a number of occasions. 

As the libel trial between Mr Depp and the Sun newspaper publisher entered its third week, Ms Heard told the court it was like being married to two people as Mr Depp transitioned from a man she loved into a 'monster' over the course of their two-year marriage. 

Ms Heard claimed she was the victim of physical and verbal abuse and was subject to controlling and intimidating behaviour by Mr Depp. 

When questioned on her drug and alcohol use, Ms Heard insisted it was not excessive and she never used cocaine while with Depp, which his lawyers rubbished as a lie. 

Mr Depp has denied all allegations of assault, claiming instead that he was the victim of domestic abuse during his relationship with Ms Heard. 

The court also heard Mr Depp accused Ms Heard of having multiple affairs with other actors, including Leonardo DiCaprio whom he called a “pumpkinhead”. 

Image: AP
